statements: DELETE FROM transportation_data WHERE trip_id = 101 AND trip_date = '2022-09-05';
DELETE FROM transportation_data WHERE mode_of_transport = 'Bus' AND trip_duration_minutes > 60;
DELETE FROM transportation_usage WHERE user_id = 1 AND trip_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transportation_modes WHERE mode_id = 3 AND average_speed > 50;
DELETE FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_id = 100 AND route_name = 'Express Route'
DELETE FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM routes WHERE route_id = 100 AND distance_km > 50;
